text.section: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated.

section.section:
"Adversely affect" means to:
eliminate more than two employee positions assigned to perform bargaining unit work if the positions are:
permanently and involuntarily reduce:

"Adversely affect" does not include an action the Commission takes in accordance with:
a bona fide disciplinary proceeding;
an applicable collective bargaining agreement in accordance with Subtitle 2 of this title; or
a reallocation or reassignment to another bargaining unit work or other duties that does not result in a change in job classification or grade.

text.section: "Bargaining unit work" means work duties assigned or allocated to a position occupied within the preceding 90 days by an employee who is represented by a certified representative.
"Certified representative" means an employee organization certified as an exclusive representative in accordance with Subtitle 2 of this title.
"Secretary-treasurer" means the secretary-treasurer of the Commission.
"Service contract" means a procurement contract for services that will be provided to the Commission.
